sentences.sContent: We’re just here on a short visit.
sentences.sCn: 我们只在这儿作短暂逗留。

sentences.sContent: Why don’t you come for a visit this summer?
sentences.sCn: 你们何不今年夏天来这里做客呢？

sentences.sContent: I decided to pay him a visit at his office.
sentences.sCn: 我决定去他的办公室拜访他。

sentences.sContent: I’ve just had a visit from the police.
I’m only here for the weekend – just a flying visit this time.
sentences.sCn: 我在这里只过个周末这次逗留时间很短。

sentences.sContent: his first official visit to Britain as Russian President
sentences.sCn: 他当选俄罗斯总统后的首次正式访问英国

sentences.sContent: The town is well worth a visit.
sentences.sCn: 这个小镇绝对值得一看。

phrases.pCn: 国事访问（国家元首至其他国的官式访问）

words.tran: 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟
访问；探视；视察；正式访问

trans.tranOther: an occasion when someone goes to spend time in a place or goes to see a person
to go and spend time in a place or with someone, especially for pleasure or interest
